content:
Web search results:

[1] "Meal-Prep Tip: You should have 3/4 cup cannellini beans left over from dinner. Save them to use in dinner on Day 7. Cook the Slow-Cooker Creamy Lentil Soup Freezer Pack overnight so its ready to take for lunch on Day 5 and save for lunch on Day 7. Daily Totals: 1,200 calories, 52 g protein, 146 g carbohydrate, 30 g fiber, 53 g fat, 1,592 mg ..."
URL: https://www.eatingwell.com/article/291342/7-day-clean-eating-vegetarian-meal-plan-to-lose-weight-1200-calories/

[2] "Day 6 Snack: Chewy Honey Granola Bars. Theres sweetness from the honey, chewiness from the raisins, hints of chocolate and cinnamon, and a bit of crunch. To save a few for later, wrap individual bars and place in a resealable freezer container. When you want a satisfying treat on short notice, just grab one and let it thaw for a few minutes."
URL: https://www.tasteofhome.com/collection/vegetarian-meal-plan/

[3] "In our 7-Day Meal Plan, youll be able to rotate through simple, healthy recipes including customizable breakfast sandwiches, oatmeal, pancakes, and avocado toast. 2. Turn your dinner into leftovers for lunch. Going out to lunch every day can be a bad habit for your health and bank account. If youre going to be cooking dinner, you might as ..."
URL: https://www.cooksmarts.com/articles/free-budget-meal-plan/

[4] "7. A Week of Easy Plant-Based Dinners Packed with Protein. Its a common misconception that its not always easy to get your fill of protein if youre eating meatless. But this plan proves that its easy to dish up filling meat-free meals, with recipes for falafel-spiced tofu, vegetarian green curry, and chickpea stew."
URL: https://www.thekitchn.com/our-10-best-vegetarian-meal-plans-23048927

[5] "Low carb: Vegetarian #5. This week offers a delicious, colorful, and nutritious mix of vegetarian and vegan low-carb dishes. They will satisfy your appetite and make your taste buds sing. Indulge in vibrant veggies, flavorful cheeses and exciting spices. This meal plan will keep you below 33 g net carbs per day. Full meal plan →."
URL: https://www.dietdoctor.com/low-carb/meal-plans/vegetarian-diet-meal-plan

[6] "Meal Prep Noodle Soup Jars. $3.25 recipe / $0.81 serving. These easy meal prep noodle soup jars are a fast, convenient, and budget-friendly make-ahead lunch idea. Just add hot water, mix, and enjoy!"
URL: https://www.budgetbytes.com/category/recipes/vegetarian/

[7] "Day 3. Vegetarian meal plan on budget - Sweet potato. Breakfast- 1 serving of oatmeal with apple and banana with 2 cups of strawberries. Lunch- 2 servings of bell peppers and hummus snack with 2 servings of peanut butter and celery. Dinner- 2 servings of blueberry almond butter oatmeal with 1 serving of microwaved sweet potato."
URL: https://www.dietsmealplan.com/meal-plan/on-a-budget/vegetarian-meal-plan-on-budget/

[8] "Vegetarian Spaghetti Squash Lasagna. $2.91 per serving. Budget Tip: Going meatless a few times a week is good for your health, good for your wallet and good for the environment. This vegetarian spaghetti squash lasagna, with 18 grams of satisfying protein and 7 grams of filling fiber, is a great budget recipe youll turn to time and time again."
URL: https://www.eatingwell.com/article/126017/7-day-budget-meal-plan-shopping-list/

[9] "Smash one-half of an avocado with some lime or lemon juice in a small bowl. This should be spread over the toast. Add one or two eggs for an increase in protein, or for a vegan version, mash white beans into the avocado. Add cheese crumbles, chopped nuts or seeds, baby greens, or cherry tomatoes as garnishes. 3."
URL: https://thesuperhealthyfood.com/breakfast-lunch-and-dinner-meal-plan-for-a-week/

[10] "2. Loaded avocado toast. Avocado toast can be a nutritious breakfast, as avocados are a good source of healthy fats and very filling. Start with a toasted slice of 100% whole grain, rye, or ..."
URL: https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/easy-healthy-meals
Current date: 19/02/2023

Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: low budget vegetarian 7 day meal plan breakfast , lunch and dinner including snacks diabetes friendly
